title: NetApp - Spot Connect
description: Spot Connect allows users to visually orchestrate infrastructure automation flows with a powerful editor. These flows perform logical operations and actions across tools and cloud environments.
responsibilities: Led frontend architecture in a micro-frontend environment using React
Built and maintained reusable UI components with thorough unit tests
Owned sprint planning, ticket creation, and task distribution for the UI team
Conducted daily standups to monitor progress and unblock team members
Integrated Blackduck and CodeQL to automate security scanning in CI/CD

title: TrilioVault
description: TrilioVault is a Kubernetes-native backup and recovery solution designed for scalable, hybrid cloud infrastructure.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented UI architecture from scratch
Developed features for backup and restore workflows using React
Built multi-cluster login and session isolation for secure access
Integrated WebSockets for live state synchronization in Redux
Handled complex Kubernetes API integrations directly from UI
Performed detailed peer reviews for code quality and performance

title: Capitalmind
description: Capitalmind is a platform for researching, analyzing, and comparing Indian mutual funds and investment strategies.
responsibilities: Built mutual funds web application with React and Next.js
Converted detailed Figma designs into responsive UIs
Implemented edge caching and SSR with Next.js for performance
Created component library on top of Mantine
Used React Query for efficient server-side data hydration
Led UI team with PR reviews and cross-team coordination

title: Looking Point - Acela Portal
description: Acela Portal is a centralized enterprise platform for managing IT lifecycle, inventory, and assets, now rebuilt using modern UI architecture with React 19 and Tailwind CSS.
responsibilities: Led frontend architecture and design for enterprise IT management portal
Created dynamic UI components and forms powered by JSON schemas
Built modules for asset lifecycle tracking, support renewals, and inventory management
Developed document editor with markdown support for dynamic SOW generation
Rebuilt frontend using React 19, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui for consistent design system
Built and maintained a cross-platform Electron-based desktop client
Managed the UI team, conducted sprint planning, code reviews, and dependency updates

title: PlayFi - Linux TV App
description: PlayFi is a custom-built media application developed for Linux-based Smart TVs using Electron, offering a fullscreen app-like experience with D-pad remote control support.
responsibilities: Developed and optimized an Electron-based Smart TV application for Linux
Implemented remote control navigation using custom React hooks and keyboard events
Scaled media and font sizes responsively using vw/vh units and CSS flex layouts
Ensured consistent fullscreen rendering without relying on zoom levels

title: Jobility
description: Jobility is an on-demand job marketplace for companies and gig workers, featuring dedicated portals for workers, employers, and admins.
responsibilities: Built scalable frontends for worker, admin, and super admin portals
Implemented access-based reusable components using React
Integrated WebSocket-based real-time notifications
Collaborated closely with backend on API contracts
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure application quality

title: Luxury Presence
description: Luxury Presence provides real estate professionals with customizable websites and marketing tools.
responsibilities: Built reusable UI components in Angular for real estate site builder
Developed configurable component settings accessible from dashboard
Contributed to new dashboard platform for owners, admins, and super admins
Architected base code structure and layout templates
Implemented Google Analytics dashboards for tracking user interactions

title: Auto Gear
description: Auto Gear offers cross-platform apps that help users access and manage automotive information across devices.
responsibilities: Built responsive apps based on functional prototypes and high-fidelity designs
Established best practices for scalable frontend architecture
Ensured graceful degradation for older browsers (including IE)
Explored emerging frontend tools and methodologies
Implemented test-driven development and E2E test coverage
Applied security practices across the UI layer

title: Smart City
description: Smart City app enables citizens to report urban issues via mobile and web platforms, driving civic engagement.
responsibilities: Built scalable web modules for citizen complaints and issue tracking
Involved in all stages of the software lifecycle
Wrote maintainable, testable code with strong performance
Ensured UI/UX aligned with product specifications
Participated in regular releases and versioning of components
Researched modern technologies for continuous improvement

title: Transport War
description: Transport War connects users with trusted logistics providers who can competitively bid on shipping requests.
responsibilities: Developed scalable modules for shipment bidding and logistics workflows
Wrote and maintained unit and functional tests
Automated deployment processes and CI scripts
Built UI modules using AngularJS
Collaborated with product owners to finalize requirements
Resolved bugs and conducted root cause analysis

title: Orion
description: Orion is a moderation platform for reviewing and managing image content across dating and social platforms.
responsibilities: Developed AngularJS-based moderation tools for Admin and Moderator roles
Built reusable components for image review workflows
Implemented multi-page layouts and dynamic UI rendering
Worked on early-stage prototypes and validation
Collaborated with design teams on alternate UI concepts
Coordinated across QA, web, and content teams

title: Blockpath
description: Blockpath offers a visual interface for exploring blockchain transactions with advanced filtering capabilities.
responsibilities: Developed UI for blockchain address and transaction explorer
Built POC features based on evolving product requirements
Created multiple pages with interactive data views
Implemented early prototypes of data filtering features
Proposed and developed alternate UI options using AngularJS and HTML5
